title: ummm wasted promo
body: so i was in my promo lost the first one so i quit playing ranked for the day and came back to play my second got to ban phase and no champions popped up so i couldnt ban on the new launcher but got removed from the game and the ol 10 min dodger screen. why am i hated so much.

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your assets not being pulled properly, which could be caused by factors like a bad install or permissions issue.  I recommend going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to rule out that possibility and make sure your game files have access.  

The updated client is also in testing so you may run into problems.  You can return to the legacy client while testing is on-going:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
and another game i cant see champs i cant changes runes/masteries or even wards
